doc.field: Jeanette Goldberg Women's Army Corps (WAC) papers
Jeanette Goldberg Women's Army Corps (WAC) papers

Twenty-one images in four sleeves, from an enveloped marked "Daytona Beach WAAC Photos Parading on the beach & Cantonment." Thirteen images are full or partial postcards with the captions • "Informal discussion groups add interest to life in the WAAC" • "The WAAC's own band parades at a training center" • "A Company of the WAAC drilling at Daytona Beach, Florida" • "Physical training keeps WAACs fit and alert" • "At Ease on Beach" • "WAACs on parade" • "Retreat" • "Drilling on Street" • "Reporting at the Clarendon Hotel" • "Cantonment" • "Bugle Call" • "Fall out, Tent City" • "Repairing army truck
Jeanette Goldberg Women's Army Corps (WAC) papers
